short_summary: Supply and delivery of a mini track loader.
description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a mini track loader. The unit must be delivered before or on March 31, 2024. The contract period will be from date of award to March 31st, 2025.
duration_in_months: Our model forecasted that around 24 months will pass for completing this project.
full_summary:
### Notice for Mini Track Loader Tender
#### Solicitation Number: WS4200634980

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting contractors to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of a mini track loader on a competitive, open bidding basis. 

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4200634980
* **Publication Date:** November 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Period:** January 31, 2024, to March 31, 2025

The required mini track loader will be delivered to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AGR) in support of their program needs. The supply and delivery of the vehicle must be completed before or on March 31, 2024.

#### Key Requirements

* Unspsc: *22101500 - Earth moving machinery
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia, Canada
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Procurement Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Thomas Leboeuf
	+ Email: thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: None
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17902086?extsite=MTc5MDIwODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of a mini track loader in accordance with the requirements outlined in this tender notice.
